properties.areaDesc: Inland Cameron; Inland Kenedy; Inland Willacy; Brooks; Northern Hidalgo; Jim Hogg
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 27 at 6:59AM CST by NWS Brownsville TX
properties.description:
Areas of fog...some locally dense...have developed across the Rio
Grande Valley this morning. Visibilities are reduced to 1 to 3
miles with locally dense fog reducing visibilities to a quarter of
a mile at times. After sunrise, fog will gradually start to lift
with conditions improving.

Motorists are urged to drive with caution this morning as
visibility may change rapidly over short distances. Use low beam
headlights and leave extra distance between your vehicle and
others on the road when encountering significant reductions in
visibility. Allow extra time to travel to destinations.

NWSheadline: AREAS OF FOG EXPECTED TO CONTINUE ACROSS DEEP SOUTH TEXAS THIS MORNING
